title: Now That We Found Love
description: Katie and Ashley celebrate Valentine's Day by breaking up with Christ Pratt (7:53), then picking six more break-up stories like Joe Flacco and the Ravens (18:20), Kyler Murray and Baseball (29:10), and Mo Salah and his beard (33:05). Later, Katie writes sports poems (47:50) and the gang names a dog (1:00:00).
